==== NetFlow tools ====

 <nowiki>[[http://nfdump.sourceforge.net/|NFdump]]</nowiki> - Back-end netflow collector that receives netflow from your routers

 <nowiki>[[http://nfsen.sourceforge.net/|NFsen]]</nowiki> - Web-based front-end to NFdump, used to view graphs and run queries

 <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/projects/fprobe|Fprobe]]</nowiki> - Allows a server to generate netflow based on the traffic to an interface

 An extensive list of open-source and commercial Netflow software
